Body:
stats = self._config_and_run_stream_stats_test(rx_ports=[self.port1])
assert stats[str(self.ports[self.port1].streams[1])]['tx']['framesSent'] == 1
assert stats[str(self.ports[self.port1].streams[1])]['rx'][str(self.ports[
    self.port1])]['totalFrames'] == -1
assert stats[str(self.ports[self.port1].streams[1])]['rx'][str(self.ports[
    self.port2])]['totalFrames'] == -1
assert stats[str(self.ports[self.port2].streams[2])]['tx']['framesSent'] == 4
assert stats[str(self.ports[self.port2].streams[2])]['rx'][str(self.ports[
    self.port2])]['totalFrames'] == -1
assert stats[str(self.ports[self.port2].streams[2])]['rx'][str(self.ports[
    self.port1])]['totalFrames'] == 4
